articles.author: Al Jazeera Staff
articles.title: UEFA Euro 2024: full football match schedule, start times, format and teams - Al Jazeera English
articles.description: All you need to know about the 2024 European Football Championships in Germany ahead of the June 14 tournament kick off.
articles.content:
• The UEFA Euro 2024 tournament is hosted by Germany and will kick off on June 14, with the final on July 14.
  • In the opening match of the tournament, Germany take on Scotland in Munich … [+6334 chars]
